articles.content:
Liverpool face Spurs in the Premier League this evening as their injury problems continue.
The bad luck grew over the past week after Jurgen Klopp confirmed on Friday that both Diogo Jota and Kostas… [+6711 chars]

articles.title: Financial £2m impact explained after Liverpool suffered 'hard to take' Joe Gomez injury - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: When players are injured on international duty somebody has to pick up the tab
articles.content:
When Joe Gomez fell to the ground in agony during an England training session early last month it was a blow to the player, the Three Lions and Liverpool.
